title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the easiest way to get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; zero dependencies.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer; use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, or tool-wielding agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs entirely in-browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Android-compatible with reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive REPL with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into inline GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Postgres history, and nginx HTTPS.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for private LLM summarization and note Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node to plug local models into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for retrieval-augmented generation with Ollama embedders and generators.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Auto-configuration Spring-Boot starter injecting Ollama service beans.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK with Blazor demo and Semantic Kernel connector.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: NPM package giving an OpenAI-compatible CLI wrapper over Ollama for drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Lightweight PyPI package exposing Ollama embedding endpoints with NumPy helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot bringing slash-command access to any Ollama model.
